attributes.action: observe the UN Day of Peace on September 21st throughout the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the resolution concerning this day was proposed by the UK government and passed unanimously by the General Assembly,we propose that all cities, towns and villages in the UK be encouraged to observe this day each year.  
The United Nations flag to be flown on this day, and possibly for a month until United Nations Day on October 24th. on all government and local government buildings. This period will give opportunities for schools, civic, public and local organisations to organise suitable peaceful events, promoting alternatives to violence and war. The period will give schools a time to focus on education in conflict resolution at all levels from personal situations to international situations.
It will give our leaders and the population in general time to reflect on how peace can be achieved in our personal lives and between countries.  It will give an opportunity for us to learn how to negotiate  and the art of diplomacy, rather than preparations for violent conflict.
